debug_text.text: '[GT-Search] âš ï¸ SearchTradeRoutes called without parameters - cannot proceed'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === TRADE SEARCH START ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Pilot: ' + $pilotInfo + '
Current Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Max Distance: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps' + '
Min ROI: ' + $minROI + '%' + '
Min Absolute Profit: ' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
Ship Cargo: ' + ($ship.cargo.capacity.all - $ship.cargo.free.all) + '/' + $ship.cargo.capacity.all

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” Continuation check: waitingFlag=' + $savedWaitingForBatch + ', liveShip=' + $savedShipId + ', currentShip=' + $ship.idcode + ', tradeListCount=' + $savedTradeListCount
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Live search continuation detected - using live results (' + $liveTradeList.count + ' trades) instead of running cache search again'
'[GT-Search] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ”„ ForceLiveSearch flag set - skipping cache, going straight to live search'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ bestTrade from source (cache/live) is INVALID - cleared for fallback fix'

'[GT-Search] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” RETRIEVING STATS FROM CONTINUATION:' + '
 TradesRejectedDocking exists: ' + (if global.$GT_SearchResult.$TradesRejectedDocking? then 'yes' else 'no') + '
 TradesRejectedBlacklist exists: ' + (if global.$GT_SearchResult.$TradesRejectedBlacklist? then 'yes' else 'no') + '
 TradesRejectedBlacklist value: ' + (if global.$GT_SearchResult.$TradesRejectedBlacklist? then global.$GT_SearchResult.$TradesRejectedBlacklist else 'null') + '
 FilteredByBlacklist exists: ' + (if global.$GT_SearchResult.$FilteredByBlacklist? then 'yes' else 'no') + '
 FilteredByBlacklist value: ' + (if global.$GT_SearchResult.$FilteredByBlacklist? then global.$GT_SearchResult.$FilteredByBlacklist else 'null') + '
 FilteredByPathBlocked exists: ' + (if global.$GT_SearchResult.$FilteredByPathBlocked? then 'yes' else 'no') + '
 FilteredByPathBlocked value: ' + (if global.$GT_SearchResult.$FilteredByPathBlocked? then global.$GT_SearchResult.$FilteredByPathBlocked else 'null') + '
 TotalTradesEvaluated exists: ' + (if global.$GT_SearchResult.$TotalTradesEvaluated? then 'yes' else 'no') + '
 TotalTradesEvaluated value: ' + (if global.$GT_SearchResult.$TotalTradesEvaluated? then global.$GT_SearchResult.$TotalTradesEvaluated else 'null')

'[GT-Search] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ“ STORED STATS ON CONTINUATION (available for logbook if execution fails):' + '
 TotalEvaluated: ' + $totalEvaluated + '
 TotalBlacklistFiltered: ' + $totalBlacklistFiltered + '
 RejectedDocking: ' + $tradesRejectedDocking + '
 RejectedProfit: ' + $tradesRejectedProfit + '
 RejectedAmount: ' + $tradesRejectedAmount

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ Previous live search returned 0 trades - ' + if $needsEscape then 'ESCAPE NEEDED, skipping cooldown' else 'applying cooldown to prevent loop (ship may be stuck in blacklisted sector)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') â¸ï¸ Applied 60s cooldown after zero-trade live search - ship may be stuck, will retry later'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸš¨ ESCAPE NEEDED: Zero trades found but ship in blacklisted sector - clearing cooldown to allow immediate escape search'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Cache miss â†’ live search cooldown active (' + ($cooldownRemaining / 1) + 's remaining of ' + ($cooldownData.$CooldownDuration / 1) + 's) - skipping live search to prevent loop'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸš¨ ESCAPE NEEDED: Ship in blacklisted sector - bypassing cooldown to search for escape route'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') No suitable cached trade found, performing live market search'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Cache miss â†’ live search cooldown increased to ' + ($newCooldown / 1) + 's'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Skipping live search due to cooldown - preserving cache results (bestTrade may be null, tradeList.count=' + (if $tradeList? and $tradeList.count? then $tradeList.count else 0) + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Live search batch processing in progress - waiting for completion'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ bestTrade from global.$GT_SearchResult is INVALID - cleared for fallback fix'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ bestTrade was null but tradeList has ' + $tradeList.count + ' trades - selected valid trade[' + $i + '] as bestTrade'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Trade execution check: bestTrade=' + $bestTradeCheck + ', tradeList.count=' + $tradeListCount + ', isContinuation=' + $isLiveSearchContinuation
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… bestTrade is VALID - proceeding with execution'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ bestTrade is INVALID (null or missing properties) - cannot execute'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ Attempting to select valid trade from tradeList (' + $tradeList.count + ' trades available)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Selected valid trade from tradeList[' + $i + '] (Score: ' + $candidateScore + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ No valid trades found in tradeList (' + (if $tradeList? and $tradeList.count? then $tradeList.count else 0) + ' entries) - all trades invalid'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… ENTERING bestTrade execution block'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ“Š BEST TRADE SELECTED:' + '
 ðŸ“¦ Ware: ' + $wareName + ' (x' + $amount + ')' + '
 ðŸ“ BUY from: ' + $buyStationName + ' @ ' + ($buyPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“ SELL to: ' + $sellStationName + ' @ ' + ($sellPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸš€ Distance: ' + $distance + ' jumps' + '
 ðŸ’° Profit: ' + ($profit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“ˆ ROI: ' + $roi + '%' + '
 ðŸ“Š Score: ' + $score + '
 âš Risk: ' + $risk

set_value.name: $diagnosticInfo
set_value.exact:
'

ðŸ” SEARCH CONTEXT:' + '
 Search method: ' + $searchMethod + (if $cacheChecked then '
 Cache checked: Yes (' + $cacheCount + ' entries)' else '
 Cache checked: No') + (if $searchMethod == 'live' and $stationsEvaluated? then '
 Stations evaluated: ' + $stationsEvaluated else '') + (if $searchMethod == 'live' and $offersFound? then '
 Offers found: ' + $offersFound else '') + (if $searchMethod == 'cache' and $validEntries gt 0 then '
 Valid cached trades found: ' + $validEntries + ' (diverse list: ' + $diverseListCount + ')' else '') + (if $totalRejected == 0 and $validEntries == 0 and ($offersFound == 0 or not $offersFound?) then '
 âš ï¸ No trades were evaluated (cache empty or no offers found)' else '') + (if $validEntries gt 0 and $diverseListCount == 0 then '
 âš ï¸ All valid trades filtered out during diverse list building (need unique station pairs)' else '')

set_value.name: $bestRejectedInfo
set_value.exact:
'

ðŸ† BEST REJECTED TRADE (still unprofitable):' + '
 Ware: ' + (if $rejectedWare? then @$rejectedWare.name else 'Unknown') + '
 Buy from: ' + (if $rejectedBuyFrom? then @$rejectedBuyFrom.knownname else 'Unknown') + ' @ ' + (if $rejectedBuyPrice? then ($rejectedBuyPrice / 100) else '0') + ' Cr/unit' + '
 Sell to: ' + (if $rejectedSellTo? then @$rejectedSellTo.knownname else 'Unknown') + ' @ ' + (if $rejectedSellPrice? then ($rejectedSellPrice / 100) else '0') + ' Cr/unit' + '
 Best profit found: ' + (if $rejectedProfit? then ($rejectedProfit / 100) else '0') + ' Cr (needed: ' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr)' + '
 Best ROI found: ' + (if $rejectedROI? then $rejectedROI else '0') + '% (needed: ' + $minROI + '%)'

debug_text.text:
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === NO TRADES FOUND ANALYSIS ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Search params: Dist=' + $maxDistance + ', MinROI=' + $minROI + '%, MinAbsoluteProfit=' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr' + $diagnosticInfo + '

ðŸ“Š REJECTION STATISTICS:' + '
 â›” Docking not allowed: ' + $tradesRejectedDocking + '
 ðŸ’° Insufficient profit: ' + $tradesRejectedProfit + '
 ðŸ“ Distance too far: ' + $tradesRejectedDistance + '
 ðŸ“¦ Amount zero/negative: ' + $tradesRejectedAmount + '
 â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”' + '
 TOTAL REJECTED: ' + $totalRejected + $bestRejectedInfo

'[GT-Search] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ“ STORING REJECTION STATS FOR LOGBOOK:' + '
 SectorName: ' + (if $currentSectorName? then $currentSectorName else 'null') + '
 MaxDistance: ' + $maxDistance + '
 MinAbsoluteProfit: ' + ($minAbsoluteProfit/100) + ' Cr' + '
 TotalEvaluated: ' + $totalEvaluated + '
 TotalRejected: ' + $totalRejected + '
 RejectedDocking: ' + $tradesRejectedDocking + '
 RejectedProfit: ' + $tradesRejectedProfit + '
 RejectedAmount: ' + $tradesRejectedAmount + '
 RejectedBlacklist (eval phase): ' + $tradesRejectedBlacklist + '
 FilteredBlacklist (pre-filter): ' + $filteredByBlacklistFromResume + '
 FilteredPathBlocked (pre-filter): ' + $filteredByPathBlockedFromResume + '
 TotalBlacklistFiltered: ' + $totalBlacklistFiltered + '
 OffersFound: ' + $offersFound + '
 TotalTradesFromResume: ' + $totalTradesFromResume

set_value.name: $lockReason
set_value.exact: if $isLiveSearchContinuation then 'live search continuation complete' else 'search complete'

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Search lock released (' + $lockReason + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Search lock retained (waiting for live search batch to complete)'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” SEARCH COMPLETE (active: ' + global.$GT_SearchQueue.$ActiveSearches + '/' + global.$GT_SearchQueue.$MaxConcurrent + ', queued: ' + global.$GT_SearchQueue.$Ships.count + ')'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] âš Cache is DISABLED (global.$GT_GlobalSettings.$Fleet.$EnableTradeCache = false) - cannot use cache'
'[GT-Cache] âš Cache too small (' + global.$GT_TradeCache.count + ' entries) - forcing live search to replenish'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] Cache is empty but enabled - threshold is ' + ($cacheThreshold/1) + '% ROI (check batch processor logs for why trades are rejected)'
'[GT-Cache-DEBUG] Cache has ' + global.$GT_TradeCache.count + ' trade entries'

do_if.value: not $cacheEntry? or not $cacheEntry.$BuyOffer? or not $cacheEntry.$SellOffer? or not $cacheEntry.$Timestamp?

debug_text.text: '[GT-Cache] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Trade score recalculation: Ware=' + @$cacheEntryWare.name + ', Profit=' + ($cacheEntry.$Profit / 100) + 'Cr, Shipâ†’Buy=' + $buyDistance + ', Buyâ†’Sell=' + $sellDistance + ', Homeâ†’Buy=' + $rangeCheckBuy + ', Homeâ†’Sell=' + $rangeCheckSell + ', Efficiency=' + $efficiency
'[GT-Cache] Diverse list built: ' + $diverseList.count + ' trades from ' + $tradesByWare.keys.count + ' wares'

'[GT-Cache] âœ… Cache HIT for ' + $ship.idcode + ': Found cached trade (Score: ' + $bestScore + ', checked: ' + $checkedEntries + ', valid: ' + $validEntries + ', expired: ' + $expiredEntries + ', diverse list: ' + $tradeList.count + ' trades)'

'[GT-Cache] âŒ Cache MISS for ' + $ship.idcode + ': No valid cached trades (checked: ' + $checkedEntries + ', expired: ' + $expiredEntries + ', ' + $missReason + ', maxDistance: ' + $maxDistance + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ Home base: ' + @$homeBase.knownname + ' (sector: ' + $homeSector.knownname + ') [source: ' + $homeBaseSource + ']'

set_value.name: $shipIsIsolated
set_value.exact: if $isolatedValue? and ($isolatedValue == true or $isolatedValue == 1) then true else false

debug_text.text: '[GT-Search] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ”’ ISOLATED: Collecting offers from current sector only: ' + (if $sectorName? then $sectorName else 'NULL') + ' (price range expanded: sell max=' + $sellPriceMax + ', buy min=' + $buyPriceMin + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ NATIVE ACTIONS: Collected ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell + ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy offers (instant C++ query)'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ Native query returned 0 offers with filters: dockable=true, enemy=false, amountâ‰¥100, totalvolumeâ‰¥100, sellPriceâ‰¤average, buyPriceâ‰¥average'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Found ' + $testOffersFound + ' offers with MINIMAL filters (tradesknownto only) - testing individual filters...'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Test 1 (tradesknownto+dock): ' + $test1Found + ' offers'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Test 2 (+enemy filter): ' + $test2Found + ' offers'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Test 3 (+relativeprice): ' + $test3Found + ' offers (BLOCKING FILTER IDENTIFIED!)'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ Even MINIMAL query (tradesknownto only) returns 0 offers - ship may not know about any stations'

do_if.value: ($allSellOffers.count gt 0 or $allBuyOffers.count gt 0) and $maxDistance? and $maxDistance gt 0

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ“ PRE-FILTERED distance (range-only): ' + $sellOffersDistanceFiltered + ' sell, ' + $buyOffersDistanceFiltered + ' buy (max: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Offers within range: ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Total offers before indexing: ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ OPTIMIZED: Limited to ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell + ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy offers (top ' + $maxOffersPerWare + ' per ware)'

set_value.name: $stateData
set_value.exact: table[ $batchId = $batchIndex, $waitingCue = null, $ship = $ship, $wareKeysList = $wareKeysList, $sellOffersList = $sellOffersList, $buyOffersList = $buyOffersList, $stationDistanceCache = $stationDistanceCache, $tradeList = [], $crossStationBestScore = 0, $crossStationBestTrade = null, $nonConflictedBestScore = 0, $nonConflictedBestTrade = null, $reservedRoutes = $reservedRoutes, $failedTrades = $failedTrades, $currentWareIndex = 0, $tradesPerWare = table[], $maxTradesPerWare = 5, $batchSize = 1, $earlyExitThreshold = 100, $maxDistance = $maxDistance, $distancePenaltyMultiplier = $distancePenaltyMultiplier, $factionPriority = $factionPriority, $minROI = $minROI, $minAbsoluteProfit = $minAbsoluteProfit, $gt_AdvancedAnalytics = $gt_AdvancedAnalytics, $availableMoney = $availableMoney, $tradesRejectedProfit = 0, $tradesRejectedDocking = 0, $tradesRejectedAmount = 0, $tradesRejectedDistance = 0, $bestRejectedProfit = null, $bestRejectedTrade = null, $homeSector = $homeSector ]

debug_text.text: '[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Prepared batch data: ' + $wareKeysList.count + ' wares, batchIndex=' + $batchIndex
'[GT-Resume] âš ï¸ Batch results not found for ship ' + $ship.idcode
'[GT-Resume] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Processing ' + $tradeList.count + ' trades from batch processor (maxDistance: ' + $maxDistance + ')'

set_value.name: $filteringStats
set_value.exact:
'[GT-Resume] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Filtering statistics:' + '
 Total trades: ' + $tradeList.count + '
 ðŸ TRUE intra-sector trades: ' + $intraSectorTradesTotal + ' (filtered: ' + $intraSectorTradesFiltered + ', valid: ' + $intraSectorTradesValid + ')' + '
 Filtered by ware basket: ' + $filteredByWareBasket + '
 Filtered by illegal: ' + $filteredByIllegal + '
 Filtered by blacklist: ' + $filteredByBlacklist + '
 Filtered by path blocked: ' + $filteredByPathBlocked + '
 Valid trades: ' + $filteredTradeList.count

set_value.name: $wareStatsLog
set_value.exact: $wareStatsLog + '\n - ' + @$ware.name + ': ' + $stats.$total + ' checked, ' + $stats.$filteredByWareBasket + ' basket, ' + $stats.$filteredByIllegal + ' illegal, ' + $stats.$filteredByBlacklist + ' blacklist, ' + $stats.$filteredByPathBlocked + ' path, ' + $stats.$valid + ' valid'

debug_text.text: '[GT-Resume] (' + $ship.idcode + ') After ship-specific filtering: ' + $filteredTradeList.count + ' trades (from ' + $tradeList.count + ')'
'[GT-Resume] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Building diverse list from ' + $filteredTradeList.count + ' filtered trades'
'[GT-Resume] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ EARLY EXIT for ware ' + @$ware.name + ': Reached distance limit at trade ' + $i + '/' + $sortedTrades.count + ' (skipped ' + $skippedDueToDistance + ' trades)'
'[GT-Resume] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Diverse list: ' + $diverseList.count + ' trades (top 5 per ware)'
'[GT-Resume] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Cache cleanup: Deleted ' + $deletedCount + ' entries older than 15 minutes'

do_if.value: $tradeBuyDistance ge 0 and $tradeSellDistance ge 0 and $tradeBuyDistance le $maxDistance and $tradeSellDistance le $maxDistance
$tradeBuyDistance ge 0 and $tradeSellDistance ge 0 and $tradeBuyDistance le $maxDistance and $tradeSellDistance le $maxDistance

debug_text.text: '[GT-Resume] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Complete. Returning ' + $diverseList.count + ' diverse trades. Best score: ' + $bestScore
'[GT-Resume] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Signaled SearchTradeRoutes to continue with live search results (' + $finalTradeCount + ' trades)'
'[GT-Resume] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ Could not find original parameters to signal SearchTradeRoutes - results stored in global.$GT_SearchResult'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === SELL SEARCH START ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Current Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Max Distance: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps' + '
Min Profit: ' + $minProfit + ' Cr'

'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Cargo contains ' + $currentCargo.count + ' ware types, selling first: ' + @$selectedWare.name + ' x' + $selectedAmount + ' (after sale, will retry for remaining wares)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (intra-sector sale in blacklisted sector - must escape)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (station blacklisted)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (sector activity blacklisted)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (sector travel blacklisted)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (not operational)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Rejected ' + @$station.knownname + ' (docking not allowed)'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Best offer now: ' + @$station.knownname + ' - ' + $offer.ware.name + ' x' + $tradeAmount + ' @ ' + $offer.unitprice + ' Cr/unit (profit: ' + $profit + ' Cr)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $ship.knownname + ' found sell opportunity'
'[GT-Sell] ' + $ship.idcode + ': Best offer became invalid before order creation - retrying'
